SEARCH
Package babbynannyapi.repository

Interface EmailRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Emails,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Emails,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Emails,String>, org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.MongoRepository<Emails,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Emails,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Emails>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Emails,String>
public interface EmailRepository extends org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.MongoRepository<Emails,String>
Repository interface for managing Emails entities in MongoDB. Extends MongoRepository to provide standard CRUD operations for Emails documents. Used for email verification purposes during user registration or authentication.

  • Method Details

    • findByCodeAndEmail

      Optional<Emails> findByCodeAndEmail(String code, String email)
      Finds an Emails document by its verification code and associated email address.
      Parameters:
      code - the verification code
      email - the email address associated with the code
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the Emails document if found, or empty if not found
